channel.title: Need help with adding stats on mage's book because i weild it and stats are +0
channel.description: i need help ive got the stats on and mage's book id 6889 is in my item.java this is my mage's book in item.cfg item = 6889 Mage's_book The_magical_book_of_the_Mage. 500 200 300 0 0 0 20 0 0 0 0 20 0 0 0 is there anything wrong with it?

item.title: Need help with adding stats on mage's book because i weild it and stats are +0
item.dc:creator: @darkness2288 darkness2288
item.description:
@darkness2288 wrote:

change the number on the back after the first 3 numbers thats the stats number

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with adding stats on mage's book because i weild it and stats are +0

item.title: Need help with adding stats on mage's book because i weild it and stats are +0
item.dc:creator: @Wariors Wariors
item.description:
@Wariors wrote:

maybe if you went to item.java you may already have it there but got to item.java and in the shields list add the mage’s book id number, hopefully that helps? and if that doesn’t work you could go into item.Cfg and on the numbers of the book change them to different numbers, then log on to see the result.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with adding stats on mage's book because i weild it and stats are +0
